data.title: Did Abhishek Bachchan just hint at divorce? ‘Like’ on controversial post goes viral
meta_keywords: is aishwarya rai separated from husband
aishwarya rai and abhishek bachchan news
data.meta_description: Bollywood actor Abhishek Bachchan’s 'like' on a post related to divorce has gone viral on social media, sparking speculation about his relationship with Aishwarya Rai. Read more to know the details here.
data.text:
Bollywood actor Abhishek Bachchan’s 'like' on a post related to divorce has gone viral on social media, sparking speculation about his relationship with Aishwarya Rai. Read more to know the details here!

New Delhi: Abhishek Bachchan recently drew attention after liking a post on social media discussing the challenges of divorce and the rise of ‘grey divorces.’ This online activity came just days after his actress-wife Aishwarya Rai Bachchan made a solo appearance at Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant’s wedding.

Abhishek Bachchan ‘likes’ post on divorce

The post, shared by author Heena Khandelwal, featured an image with the words, “When love stops being easy. Couples who have been married are now parting ways. What has prompted their decision and why are grey divorces on the rise?” It also included a caption about the rising cases of divorce among older couples.

The post read: “Divorce is never easy for anyone. Who doesn’t dream of a happily ever after or envision recreating those heartwarming videos of elderly couples holding hands as they cross the street? Yet, sometimes life doesn’t unfold as we hoped. But how do people cope when they separate after decades together, after spending a significant portion of their lives relying on each other for both big and small things? What drives them to sever ties, and what challenges do they face? This story delves into these questions. Coincidentally, ‘grey divorces’ or ‘silver splitters’—terms for those seeking marital dissolution typically after age 50—are on the rise globally. The reasons, though varied, are not surprising.”

Check out Abhishek’s like on the post below!

Abhishek bacchan likes a divorce related instagram post

byu/Alarmed-Command-4433 inBollyBlindsNGossip

Fans react on Reddit

Abhishek, 48, was among many who liked the post, sparking speculation. A screenshot of his like was shared on Reddit, prompting varied reactions. Some speculated on possible marital issues, while others defended Abhishek, suggesting it could be a general like with no personal implications. One user remarked, “Kaise tum log itna observe kar lete ho yaar…just howowowow,” while another added, “(It) could just be a general like on a topic/post that makes sense.”

Aishwarya Rai arrives at Ambani wedding sans Bachchan family

Aishwarya Rai, 50, raised eyebrows when she walked the red carpet at the Ambani wedding without the Bachchan family members. She was accompanied by her daughter Aaradhya, just moments after Abhishek posed for photos with Amitabh Bachchan, Jaya Bachchan, and Shweta Bachchan. However, inside the wedding venue, videos and photos revealed that Aishwarya and Aaradhya reunited with Abhishek and attended the wedding together.

Abhishek and Aishwarya have been married for 17 years. Their marriage has often been under public scrutiny, but the couple has consistently shown a united front.
